messages.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
messages.confirmAction: Are you sure you want to proceed?
messages.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
messages.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

interrogate.title: Interrogate Transcript
interrogate.subtitle: Ask a question about the transcript.
interrogate.suggestionsIntro: Here are some suggestions based on your transcript:
interrogate.examplesIntro: Or try one of these examples:

defaultQuestions.topAction: Who owns the top action and by when?

emptyState.title: Your notes will appear here
emptyState.description: Fill in the details and click "Generate Notes" to start.

loading.title: Generating Notes
loading.description: Extracting key decisions and discussion points...

steps.extracting: Extracting key decisions and discussion points...
steps.applying: Applying RAG status to each action...
steps.polishing: Almost there, just polishing the notes...

signIn.tagline: Drive consistency and impact in every meeting.
signIn.instruction: Please sign in with your Momentum account to continue.

popupBlocked.title: Having trouble signing in?
popupBlocked.message: It looks like the sign-in pop-up was blocked. For the best experience, please open this tool in a new tab to complete authentication.
popupBlocked.button: Open in New Tab to Sign In

accessDenied.title: Access Restricted
accessDenied.message: This application is only accessible to Momentum Worldwide users.
accessDenied.contactAdmin: If you believe you should have access, please contact your administrator.

meetingCoach.title: Meeting Coach
meetingCoach.disclaimer: The following Meeting Coach analysis is for your information only and will not be included in any exports.
meetingCoach.meetingExcellenceLink: In alignment with Momentum's Meeting Excellence

testAgent.title: Test Agent Selected
testAgent.description: You are using a custom Bot ID. Reset to default in Settings to remove this notification.

resetData.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset to defaults? This will clear your saved theme, form inputs, tutorial progress, custom bot ID, and all preferences. This action cannot be undone.

participantExtraction.promptMessage: We detected {{count}} potential participant{{count, plural, one {} other {s}}} in your transcript. Would you like to automatically add them to the meeting participants list?
participantExtraction.helperText: You can always add or remove participants later from the Meeting Participants section

toasts.botIdReset: Bot ID has been reset to default.
toasts.dataReset: All data has been reset to defaults. Reloading...
toasts.unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type. Please upload a .txt or .docx file.
toasts.docxLibraryError: Could not read the .docx file or parsing library is not available.
toasts.apiConfigMissing: API configuration is missing. Check settings and environment variables.
toasts.printWindowBlocked: Could not open print window. Please disable popup blockers.
toasts.emailCopied: Email content copied. Paste into your email client.
toasts.emailCopiedPlain: Email content copied (plain text). Paste into your email client.

participants.title: Meeting Participants
participants.emptyStateHint: Or click "Add" to manually add participants
participants.searchHint: Type at least 2 characters to search
participants.searchPrompt: Start typing to search for users
participants.keyboardHint: Use ↑↓ to navigate, Enter to select, Esc to close
